genres.name: Pop
genres.description: Popular music with catchy melodies and simple track structures, appealing to a wide audience.

genres.name: Rock
genres.description: Energetic and powerful music with strong rhythms and guitar-driven sound.

genres.name: Hip Hop
genres.description: Rap and hip-hop music with rhythmic beats and often spoken word lyrics.

genres.name: Country
genres.description: Country music with traditional country themes and instrumentation.

genres.description: Jazz music with its unique blend of blues, swing, and bebop rhythms.
